songs.title: Wild Weekend
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
We've been getting beat up by this old life
Seems all we got left is Friday and Saturday night and sometimes Sunday if Monday is a holiday
I got a bunch of buddies I aren’t seen in a while
I got some good-time fun and hot dog buns in a stock pile
With some home brew
Malibu and Miller Lite

Girl put on that short little party dress
And make me a little bit Jealous
It’s going to be a wild weekend
Been on the phone with all my friends
There’s a little spot in the river bend were the sun sits high
Long as the keg don’t float and the ice don’t melt
We’ll loosen up a notch on the Bible belt

[Chorus]
Girl you can bet we’ll fall in love again and again and again
It’s going to be a wild, wild, wild weekend

[Verse 2]
It's Friday afternoon and the countdowns on, cell phone's singing that
All My Rowdy Friends Are Coming Over Tonight
Bad to the bone ringtone, come on, come on, come on
Baby let's get gone
It's bumper to bumper in the outbound
And we're already getting down
It’s going to be a wild weekend
Been on the phone with all my friends
There’s a little spot in the river bend were the sun sits high
Long as the keg don’t float and the ice don’t melt
We’ll loosen up a notch on the Bible belt

[Chorus]
Girl you can bet we’ll fall in love again and again and again
It’s going to be a wild, wild, wild weekend

Aw put on the short little party dress
Make me a little bit jealous
Get me thinking goodness
It’s going to be a wild weekend, been on the phone with all my friends
There’s a little spot in the river bend were the sun sits high
Long as the keg don’t float and the ice don’t melt, we’ll loosen up a notch on the Bible belt

[Chorus]
Girl you can bet we’ll fall in love again and again and again
It’s going to be a wild, wild, wild weekend
It's going to be a wild, wild, wild weekend. Yeah

[Outro]
We been needing this for a long, long time
O my baby sure is looking fine
What's up man? How you’ll been? Throw me a ski rope
